rent.title: Rental Products
rent.heroSubtitle: Rent high-quality baby products at affordable prices. Perfect for short-term needs or trying before you buy.

noProducts.title: No Rental Products Available
noProducts.message: We're currently updating our rental inventory. Please check back soon for new items.

benefits.title: Benefits of Renting Baby Gear
benefits.subtitle: Discover why renting baby products is a smart choice for modern parents.

saveMoney.title: Save Money
saveMoney.description: Rent items for a fraction of the purchase price, perfect for products used only for a short period.

saveSpace.title: Save Space
saveSpace.description: Avoid cluttering your home with bulky baby equipment that's only needed temporarily.

tryBeforeBuying.title: Try Before Buying
tryBeforeBuying.description: Test products with your baby before committing to a purchase, ensuring you buy only what works for you.

shop.title: Shop
shop.heroDescription: Find gently used, high-quality baby gear at affordable prices. Connect with other parents and give baby products a second life.

noProducts.title: No Products Found
noProducts.message: Try adjusting your filters or check back later for new products.

shop.maximizeExperience: Maximize your baby shopping experience with these helpful tips.
shop.compareOptions: Compare options, read reviews, and check safety ratings before making a purchase decision.
shop.askAboutItem: Ask about the item's condition, age, and any details that aren't covered in the listing.
shop.considerUsedItems: Consider gently used items for significant savings, especially for products that your baby will quickly outgrow.

sell.title: List Your Product
sell.heroDescription: List your gently used baby gear and help other parents find affordable options while earning money.
sell.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your product in detail, including condition, age, and any unique features...
sell.imageRequired: At least one image is required
sell.uploadPrompt: Click to upload or drag and drop
sell.uploadRestrictions: PNG, JPG, GIF up to 10MB (Max 5 images)
sell.tipsDescription: Follow these tips to increase your chances of selling your baby products quickly.

qualityPhotos.title: Take Quality Photos
qualityPhotos.description: Use natural light and take clear photos from multiple angles to showcase your product's condition.

detailedDescription.title: Detailed Description
detailedDescription.description: Include age, condition, brand, and any minor defects. Honesty builds trust with potential buyers.

fairPricing.title: Fair Pricing
fairPricing.description: Research similar products to set a competitive price. Consider the item's age, condition, and original value.

community.title: Community
community.description: Connect, share, and grow with fellow parents. Ask questions, swap stories, or share your journey.
community.noPosts: No posts available yet. Be the first to share!
community.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first!
community.contentPlaceholder: Share your thoughts, questions, or experiences...

footer.description: Your one-stop marketplace for pre-owned baby products. Buy, sell, and rent quality baby gear.
footer.subscribeText: Subscribe for updates on new products and promotions.
footer.thankYou: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter!
footer.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

about.title: About
about.empowering: Empowering parents, reducing waste, and building a sustainable parenting community.
about.missionText: MamaCycle is more than a marketplace — it's a movement. We help parents reduce costs and waste by enabling them to buy, sell, and rent baby products with ease. We believe that every parent deserves affordable, accessible, and sustainable solutions for raising a child.
about.visionText: To become the #1 trusted platform for parents across Egypt and the MENA region to share, support, and grow — all while protecting the planet and creating a circular economy for baby gear.
about.comprehensive: Comprehensive solutions for parents seeking quality, affordability, and community.
about.buySellText: List and purchase baby items safely and affordably through our secure marketplace.
about.rentGearText: Try before buying or rent while traveling. Perfect for short-term needs and budget-conscious families.
about.aiListingsText: Smart listing assistant with AI image cleanup to help you create professional, attractive listings quickly.
about.communityText: Join forums, get advice, and share stories with a supportive community of like-minded parents.
about.sustainabilityText: Encouraging reuse to reduce baby product waste, helping create a greener future for our children.
about.trustedSafeText: Admin-approved listings and secure transactions, ensuring peace of mind for both buyers and sellers.
about.passionate: The passionate individuals behind MamaCycle's mission and vision.
about.reemDesc: Leading our product vision and crafting delightful user experiences.
about.youssefDesc: Building beautiful, responsive interfaces with cutting-edge technologies.
about.mohamedDesc: Developing our AI-powered listing tools and strategic product roadmap.
about.abdelmalekDesc: Creating robust, scalable backend systems and RESTful APIs.
about.abdelrahmanDesc: Ensuring product quality and smooth deployment processes.
about.ctaText: Whether you're a new parent or experienced one, MamaCycle is your trusted partner for simplifying parenting, saving money, and protecting the planet.

cart.title: Shopping Cart
cart.emptyMessage: Looks like you haven't added any items to your cart yet.
cart.basedOnCart: Based on your cart items, we think these products might interest you.
